Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: ZnSO ( 4 ) pretreatment counteracted BCNU - induced inhibition of GR and depletion of GSH and resulted in significant reduction in the levels of MDA and TNFalpha as well as the activity of caspase - 3 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| BCNU-induced inhibition of GR |
| Depletion of GSH |
| Increased levels of MDA |
| Increased activity of caspase-3 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| BCNU-induced inhibition of GR |
| Depletion of GSH |
| Increased levels of MDA |
| Increased activity of caspase-3 |

Note: BCNU is an anticancer drug, but it is not a disease itself. It is mentioned as the cause of inhibition of GR and depletion of GSH, so those entities are included in the table.
